entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 9. POP 30%
entry.summary: A few flurries ending late this evening then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Local amount 5 cm. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light before morning. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Clearing in the afternoon. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 10 in the morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Clear. Low minus 7.
